articles.description: Sheikh Khaled bin Zayed Al Nehayan is hoping to complete takeover in next few days
articles.content:
Sheikh Khaled bin Zayed Al Nehayan has pockets so deep he can put the billionaire owners of Championship rivals in the shade.

articles.title: Daniel Ricciardo : Lewis Hamilton “Asked” for Shoey on Imola Podium - EssentiallySports
articles.description: Daniel Ricciardo talks about Lewis Hamilton joining himself to do a 'shoey' on the podium after the Emilia Romagna Grand Prix.
articles.content:
It was an interesting race to say the least. Renault man Daniel Ricciardo joined the Mercedes duo of Lewis Hamilton and Valtteri Bottas on the podium in Imola.

articles.author: By Daniel Davis For Mailonline
articles.title: Barcelona star Lionel Messi should have been sent off against Alaves, insists former LaLiga official - Daily Mail
articles.description: The disgruntled 33-year-old once again cut an irked figure during the limp draw with Alaves and was caught up in an unsavoury flashpoint involving the referee. The ball narrowly avoided the official.
articles.content:
Barcelona superstar Lionel Messi should have been shown a red card after he kicked the ball towards the referee in frustration at the weekend, according to a former LaLiga official.
